name: eviction-lab-exports
description: Generate exports for Eviction Lab in Serverless Lambda function
author: Eviction Lab

scripts.deploy-dev: sls deploy --stage dev && cd src && sls deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp assets s3://eviction-lab-exports/assets --recursive --acl=public-read && sls deploy --stage prod && cd src && sls deploy --stage prod
